branchCategory.name: Belt Drive
branchCategory.description: The AC servo version of the LEFB slider features an AC servo motor instead of a DC version. The AC servo motor enables higher speed and acceleration, as well as a size 40 model not available in a DC version. The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.

branchItem.name: LEFB Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Belt Drive, (AC Servo Motor, 100/200/400W)
branchItem.description: The AC servo version of the LEFB slider features an AC servo motor instead of a DC version. The AC servo motor enables higher speed and acceleration, as well as a size 40 model not available in a DC version. The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32, 40 <LI>Maximum speed: 2000 mm/s <LI>Maximum stroke: 3000 mm <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.08 mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder
</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: LEFB, Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Belt Drive, Motorless
branchItem.description: The LEFB is available in a motorless type, permitting the mounting of an AC servo motor other than the standard chosen by SMC.  Shaft coupling and mounting patterns are compatible with 8 servo motor series from 5 manufacturers.  Manufacturers include Mitsubishi, Yaskawa, Sanyo Denki, Omron, and Panasonic.
